title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Digital Creativity-Based Mathematics Learning Community (PLC) Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design math problem-solving strategies within a PLC team using digital tools
Learners can participate in peer-feedback-based formative assessments using differentiated learning materials
Learners can perform and share creative math modeling activities in an online workspace
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
